name: Haruna: Spring
description:
Shohei Okamoto is one dissociative episode away from losing his grip on reality. He’s a shut-in--a writer with a penchant for the written word and a strong distaste for the outside world. 

Explore Shohei’s strange, surrealist world as he watches his unfinished novel quite literally come to life, pushing him to come to terms with the extent of his isolation.

Music: In the Androgynous Dark - Brambles
